Class DatabaseService

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.java.DatabaseService

  • public class DatabaseService
extends java.lang.Object
    Carries connections to data source and data processing service.

      • connect

        public void connect()
             throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                    java.sql.SQLException
        This method used to establish connection to data storage.
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - if unable to register JDBC driver
        java.sql.SQLException - if unable to establish connection
